remarks: Value of double polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2polval.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
2polval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2polval.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
2polval.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
2polvalN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( U ` X ) ) ) $.
